title: Linux chkconfig Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the chkconfig command in Linux, learn how to configure service startup behavior, and manage service startup levels with practical examples.

meta.title: Linux chkconfig Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the chkconfig command in Linux, learn how to configure service startup behavior, and manage service startup levels with practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, chkconfig, service management, startup, configuration, system administration

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Usage of chkconfig Command

verify.name: Verify the status of the nginx service
verify.hint: Ensure that the nginx service is enabled in runlevels 2, 3, 4, and 5.

steps.title: Configure Service Startup Behavior Using chkconfig

verify.name: Verify the startup behavior of the sshd service
verify.hint: Ensure that the sshd service is disabled in runlevel 2 and enabled in runlevels 3, 4, and 5.

steps.title: Manage Service Startup Levels with chkconfig

verify.name: Verify the startup levels of the nginx service
verify.hint: Ensure that the nginx service is enabled in runlevels 2, 3, 4, and 6, and disabled in runlevel 5.
